DataElement.preferredName: Patient Current Sex Behavior Assessment Not Sexually Active Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: information related to the patient's assessment of satisfaction with current sexual activity._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the patient's assessment of satisfaction with current sexual activity.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.:Sexual behavior is a form of physical intimacy that can be directed to reproduction (one possible goal of sexual intercourse) and/or to enjoying the body of someone else; activities associated with sexual intercourse. (from Wikipedia):The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.
Behaviors involved with sexual arousal and/or intercourse.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: information on quality of patient life and ability to function

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Sexually Active Prefer Not to Answer Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual prefers or preferred not to answer.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual prefers or preferred not to answer.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is not or was not sexually active.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is not or was not sexually active.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
